name: Featured category opencart
tagline: Extension to provide Featured category list on Home Page which on clicking goes to respective category
body:
### Welcome to Opencart Extension Pages.
Created a Feature Products By Category List Extension
Show different featured products per categories and subcategories
Promote your product in new interactive way in each category individually


### Feature Category Extension
In default Theme of Opencart , There was no way to list categories of product
Hence showing different feature product in different was not possible.
With help of this extension its possible to show different featured products in there categories and Subcategories


### Authors and Contributors
 In 2016, Kasam Sharif (@sharifmk)

### Support or Contact
